name: Hivemind (Hex Frog Studios, @pusacaspica, PessegoIndomavel, CosmoJao)
description:
Thrive. Kill. Survive.

Maybe this is Earth. Maybe I am further away than anyone has ever been. It doesn't matter. What matters is that there is something here with me. And that something doesn't like me much. It coordinates among thousands or millions, and it wants me dead. Each body is a member, all acting against me. 

The only language it understands is hot lead, and the only communication I've been able to establish is violence.

In Hivemind, you'll be one of many that tried (and failed) in their journey to their salvation and glory. Shoot as fast as you can and kill everything that moves.

Note: This is a game jam prototype. We intend to pivot this prototype into a full game project. If you're interested and wanna keep updated, follow us on Twitter!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement (Walk)
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Mouse - Shoot (hold)

And if you want more blood and shooting, always remeber to follow us on Twitter.
